item.title: After Upgrading Ansible, pip had an issue SSL_ST_INIT
item.description: sudo apt-get remove python-openssl curl -o ./get-pip.py https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py sudo python2 ./get-pip.py Replace with yum if in RH-based OS. See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43267157/python-attributeerror-module-object-has-no-attribute-ssl-st-init for details.
